statements: SELECT * FROM RobotExperiments
SELECT robot_name, experiment_date FROM RobotExperiments
SELECT image_url, video_url FROM RobotExperiments
SELECT experiment_id, robot_name, image_url FROM RobotExperiments
SELECT * FROM RobotExperiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM RobotExperiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT experiment_id, robot_name FROM RobotExperiments WHERE robot_name LIKE '%Robo%' ORDER BY experiment_id ASC
SELECT robot_name, COUNT(experiment_id) AS num_experiments FROM RobotExperiments GROUP BY robot_name HAVING num_experiments > 5
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, image_url, video_url FROM RobotExperiments WHERE experiment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM RobotExperiments WHERE robot_name = 'R2-D2' ORDER BY experiment_date
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_name FROM images WHERE image_id > 5;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE '%car%';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT video_name FROM videos WHERE video_id > 5 ORDER BY video_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE '%cat%' AND image_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT image_id, image_name, video_name FROM images JOIN videos ON images.image_id = videos.video_id;
SELECT * FROM Robots WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, type FROM Robots WHERE type = 'Android';
SELECT id, image_url, timestamp FROM Images WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT robot_id, video_url, duration FROM Videos ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Robots WHERE name LIKE '%bot%';
SELECT * FROM Robots WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, type FROM Robots WHERE type = 'Android';
SELECT id, name, type, description FROM Robots ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT r.name, i.image_url, v.video_url FROM Robots r JOIN Images i ON r.id = i.robot_id JOIN Videos v ON r.id = v.robot_id;
SELECT type, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM Robots GROUP BY type HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_name, robot_id FROM Images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturing_date FROM Robots ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, research_area FROM Experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_name, experiment_id FROM Videos WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturing_date FROM Robots ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT video_name, robot_id FROM Videos WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT image_name, experiment_name FROM Images JOIN Experiments ON Images.experiment_id = Experiments.experiment_id;
SELECT robot_name, serial_number FROM Robots WHERE robot_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT experiment_id, research_area FROM Experiments WHERE research_area = 'Automation' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, email_address FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name FROM robots ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE robot_id = 2;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM images WHERE experiment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturing_date FROM robots WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, email_address, experiment_date FROM researchers JOIN experiments ON researchers.researcher_id = experiments.researcher_id WHERE researchers.researcher_id = 3;
